Computer_Science_452_p$Computer_Science_.text:
Finding A: Hence social networks are at best only weakly scale free, with 70% and 55% exhibiting the weakest or weak direct evidence of scale-free structure, respectively.
Finding B: Saying "Excuse me" to take a call didn\'t cut it: over 30 percent still found it to be rarely/never appropriate during informal/offsite lunch meetings.
Finding C: The final analysis shows that the mixed-reality game improved learning by almost five times more than the screen-only alternatives, both in the mouse-controlled and physically controlled conditions.
Finding D: Also, higher-income professionals showed lower acceptance for mobile phone use during meetings.

test_question_testing_D.text:

Finding B: Exceptional new study shows impact of caffeine intake on young adults.

Computer_Science_21_p$Computer_Science_4.text:
Finding A: In Study 1 (n = 182), 76% of participants thought that it would be more moral for AVs to sacrifice one passenger, rather than kill ten pedestrians (with a 95% confidence interval of 69-82).
Finding B: I can also see the robot serve as the facilitator within a group of kids to help guide their conversation, and act as a peer resource for the group.a But Mutlu cautioned that aWe have be careful in identifying and designing for these opportunities, as we do not want robots to replace natural ways of learning or available resources, such as interaction with a parent or an educator.a He also tells Inverse, ain principle, a robot like Minnie can be used by adult learners as well, although its behaviors and support for reading must be designed specifically for the target user group.a It should be noted that athere was a measurable reduction in time spent reading over timea in the study, and the authors suggested that some technical aspects of the robot that the kids found afrustratinga may have kept the children from reading more often as time went on.
Finding C: Compared with controls, taxi drivers had greater grey matter volume in the posterior hippocampi (Maguire et al.
Finding D: We suggest that both sources of utility can be diminished for scheduled leisure.

Finding B: "This is a challenge that should be on the mind of carmakers and regulators alike," the scholars write.
Finding C: The space for combosquatting is almost infinite because attackers can register as many domains as they want with any variation that they want.
Finding D: At the aggregate level we find that the airlines that began charging for one checked bag saw a significant relative improvement in their on-time departure performance in the 35-day period afterwards, compared to the airlines that were not charging for a checked bag during the same time period.

Finding B: "Here we have demonstrated the feasibility of adaptive deep brain stimulation," said Dr. Starr.

Computer_Science_tweet_71_r$Computer_Sci.text:
Finding A: @username & @username researchers propose an interesting adaptive approach to improving deep brain stimulation for #Parkinsons using motor cortex sensing\n
Finding B: "The initial findings could have been explained by a correlation, that people with big hippocampi become taxi drivers," he says.
Finding C: These new second laws are generally not noticeable except on very small scales, at which point, they become increasingly important.
Finding D: New dorsal/ventral distinction in macaque medial PFC - DMFC signals errors, and ACC integrates errors to drive task switches. Very nice work showing causal relationship, organizes a lot of literature @username
Computer_Science_tweet_71_r$Computer_Sci.displayed_text:
Finding A: @username & @username researchers propose an interesting adaptive approach to improving deep brain stimulation for #Parkinsons using motor cortex sensing\n
Finding B: "The initial findings could have been explained by a correlation, that people with big hippocampi become taxi drivers," he says.
Finding C: These new second laws are generally not noticeable except on very small scales, at which point, they become increasingly important.
Finding D: New dorsal/ventral distinction in macaque medial PFC - DMFC signals errors, and ACC integrates errors to drive task switches. Very nice work showing causal relationship, organizes a lot of literature @username

Computer_Science_tweet_44_p$Computer_Sci.text:
Finding A: Critically, the human neuroimaging data available in BOLD5000 is: 1) significantly larger than prior slow event-related fMRI datasets by an order of magnitude; 2) extremely diverse in stimuli; 3) overlaps considerably with standard computer vision datasets.
Finding B: Maguire thinks that The Knowledge may enlarge the hippocampus's posterior (rear) at the expense of its anterior (front), creating a trade-off of cognitive talents--that is, taxi drivers master some forms of memory but become worse at others.
Finding C: Core #language skill in typically and atypically developing #children, including those with #autism spectrum disorders, is stable from infancy to adolescence. This suggests that when a child’s language skills are lagging, early intervention is best @username
Finding D: @username @username Once you get into long cook times you are adding enzymatic breakdown and protein denaturization to the game. Some say that greater than 4 hours and tender cuts (beef) turn mushy I disagree. Max time depends on what kind of protein. Do not 8hr chicken.
Computer_Science_tweet_44_p$Computer_Sci.displayed_text:
Finding A: Critically, the human neuroimaging data available in BOLD5000 is: 1) significantly larger than prior slow event-related fMRI datasets by an order of magnitude; 2) extremely diverse in stimuli; 3) overlaps considerably with standard computer vision datasets.
Finding B: Maguire thinks that The Knowledge may enlarge the hippocampus's posterior (rear) at the expense of its anterior (front), creating a trade-off of cognitive talents--that is, taxi drivers master some forms of memory but become worse at others.
Finding C: Core #language skill in typically and atypically developing #children, including those with #autism spectrum disorders, is stable from infancy to adolescence. This suggests that when a child’s language skills are lagging, early intervention is best @username
Finding D: @username @username Once you get into long cook times you are adding enzymatic breakdown and protein denaturization to the game. Some say that greater than 4 hours and tender cuts (beef) turn mushy I disagree. Max time depends on what kind of protein. Do not 8hr chicken.
